::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

Zardus yells in pain as the optic blast burns through his cheeck, flying to 
the left to evade most of the grenades, several shots hitting him in the 
side. He turns to the two mercenaries, opening fire on them, his left optic 
disabled and side sparking.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica and Bloodystrike emerge from the bushes. Seeing Zardus under 
attack, the immediately open fire on the mercenaries.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot roars, opening fire on the mercenaries with his missile launcher.
